page.title: 07LEARNING TO DANCE.
page.content: My dancing started at 6pm and finished at 7pm.I wore a blue leotard with a frill at the bottom, some pink leather shoes for ballet, and white leather shoes with metal taps.One teacher is called Mrs Whitelock the other Mrs Foreman. After two years at the community centre she asked me to move to Old Hartlepool which is about one mile South East of us. It is much bigger there. In my first show I was in 8 dances which was quite a lot.To be a good dancer you must not let your legs tighten up or you will not be able to kick your height. Doing the splits every day helps you to have good kicks too. I have been dancing now for 5 years. In June I have a Royal Academy of Dance exam. I hope to get an Honours pass which is the highest mark. KAY NICOLSON AGE 11
